465210.name: Wailing Heights - Original Soundtrack and PDF Comic Artbook
465210.description:
Original soundtrack and PDF artbook

Artbook

PDF Artbook includes behind-the-scenes concept art and sketches. Also includes high-res versions of in-game comics and posters.

Soundtrack

Full tracks included:
  • Here Come the Deadbeats
  • Make it Stick
  • Namborough Farm
  • Z.O.M.B.I.E
  • HATE
  • Contraband

Mini tracks included (SPOILER ALERT!):
  • His Name's Soul Ghoulman
  • Soul Possession
  • LOLA
  • Lola Possession
  • Abnorm Possession
  • Debbie Possession
  • Ada Possession
  • Fangs Possession
  • Shaggy Possession
  • Spectra Possession
  • Chicken Run
465210.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
